title: How to Have a Super Fun Bachelorette Weekend in Key West
short_description: Congratulations! You're getting married and now planning a weekend getaway with your besties to celebrate. We know how important it is to you that you and your friends see as much possible during your stay. Hence, we put together some super fun things to do and see during your bachelorette weekend in Key West.
more_content:
Congratulations! You're getting married and now planning a weekend getaway with your besties to celebrate. We know how important it is to you that you and your friends see as much possible during your stay. Hence, we put together some super fun things to do and see during your bachelorette weekend in Key West.

Let’s Go To Brunch

Bagatelle Restaurant is located at 115 Duval Street, close to Mallory Square. It is situated in a historic, architecturally-beautiful building, built in the 1800s, that was converted into a restaurant in 1979. This is the place you'll want to sit and enjoy great food and conversation while people-watching in paradise. They've set the brunch scene with your besties.

Best Brunch in Key West!!! Great atmosphere! Beautiful building! Great staff!" ~ Christopher Cory, Recommends Bagatelle Restaurant on Facebook.

A few of our favorite brunch dishes at Bagatelle Restaurant are the Lobster Benedict, Surf & Turf Benedict, Biscuits and Gravy (a must-try) and the Bananas Foster or the Crispy French Toast! Once again, way too many to favorites. Visit and enjoy the Bagatelle Brunch experience and make sure to come back and tell us all about it.

View the Bagatelle Brunch Menu

Bagatelle
115 Duval Street, Key West, Florida | 305-296-6609
HOURS:
Open 9 am - Midnight | Brunch, Dinner and Late Night
Brunch is served 7 Days A Week from 9 am - 4 pm
